con:testCase.name: BadCase-DEV-LimitCustom-Unlimited-Thresholds
con:testCase.con:description: Tests charging with trasholds messages from ocs over unlimited value set before

con:request.name: 9500P_subscripManagement_UpdateDDParameter-SetLimitsToMinValues
con:request.con:request: <soapenv:Envelope xmlns:soapenv="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/envelope/" xmlns:cus="http://directrecharge.o2.com/ws/evolutionservice/customercharging/">\r <soapenv:Header/>\r <soapenv:Body>\r <cus:updateDirectDebitParameters>\r <directDebitParameters>\r <multibrandIds>\r <multibrandId>\r <brandId>${#Project#ChargeCustomer-1-BrandID}</brandId>\r <tenantId>${#Project#ChargeCustomer-1-TenantID}</tenantId>\r </multibrandId>\r </multibrandIds>\r <directDebitIntParameter>\r <name>ON_DEMAND_TOPUP_LIMIT</name>\r <value>5</value>\r </directDebitIntParameter>\r <directDebitIntParameter>\r <name>LOW_BALANCE_THRESHOLD_TOPUP_LIMIT</name>\r <value>5</value>\r </directDebitIntParameter>\r <directDebitMonetaryParameter>\r <!--type: directDebitParameterNameEnum - enumeration: [GENERAL_DAILY_MAX_AMOUNT,GENERAL_MONTHLY_MAX_AMOUNT,MONTHLY_UNLIMITED_AMOUNT,ON_DEMAND_TOPUP_LIMIT,LOW_BALANCE_THRESHOLD_TOPUP_LIMIT,CHARGE_BACK_INSUFFICIENT_BALANCE,CHARGE_BACK_MANDATE_REVOKED,CHARGE_BACK_AMBIGUOUS_BANK_DATA,CHARGE_BACK_OBJECTION,CHARGE_BACK_OTHER,FEE_FREED_CLAWBACK_AMOUNT]-->\r <!--Set daily limit to max. possible limit > monthly and unlimited-->\r <name>GENERAL_DAILY_MAX_AMOUNT</name>\r <value>${#TestSuite#TECHNICAL-Limit}</value>\r </directDebitMonetaryParameter>\r <!--Zero or more repetitions:-->\r <directDebitMonetaryParameter>\r <name>GENERAL_MONTHLY_MAX_AMOUNT</name>\r <value>${#TestSuite#TECHNICAL-Limit}</value>\r </directDebitMonetaryParameter>\r <directDebitMonetaryParameter>\r <name>FEE_FREED_CLAWBACK_AMOUNT</name>\r <value>${#Project#FEE_FREED_CLAWBACK_AMOUNT}</value>\r </directDebitMonetaryParameter>\r <directDebitMonetaryParameter>\r <name>MONTHLY_UNLIMITED_AMOUNT</name>\r <value>${#TestSuite#GENERAL_DAILY_MAX_AMOUNT}</value>\r </directDebitMonetaryParameter>\r <chargeBackParameter>\r <!--type: directDebitParameterNameEnum - enumeration: [GENERAL_DAILY_MAX_AMOUNT,GENERAL_MONTHLY_MAX_AMOUNT,MONTHLY_UNLIMITED_AMOUNT,ON_DEMAND_TOPUP_LIMIT,LOW_BALANCE_THRESHOLD_TOPUP_LIMIT,CHARGE_BACK_INSUFFICIENT_BALANCE,CHARGE_BACK_MANDATE_REVOKED,CHARGE_BACK_AMBIGUOUS_BANK_DATA,CHARGE_BACK_OBJECTION,CHARGE_BACK_OTHER,FEE_FREED_CLAWBACK_AMOUNT]-->\r <name>CHARGE_BACK_INSUFFICIENT_BALANCE</name>\r <SEPAReasonCodes>\r <SEPAReasonCode>${#Project#CHARGE_BACK_INSUFFICIENT_BALANCE-Code-1}</SEPAReasonCode>\r </SEPAReasonCodes>\r <fee>${#Project#CHARGE_BACK_INSUFFICIENT_BALANCE}</fee>\r </chargeBackParameter>\r <chargeBackParameter>\r <name>CHARGE_BACK_MANDATE_REVOKED</name>\r <SEPAReasonCodes>\r <SEPAReasonCode>${#Project#CHARGE_BACK_MANDATE_REVOKED-Code-1}</SEPAReasonCode>\r </SEPAReasonCodes>\r <fee>${#Project#CHARGE_BACK_MANDATE_REVOKED}</fee>\r </chargeBackParameter>\r <chargeBackParameter>\r <name>CHARGE_BACK_AMBIGUOUS_BANK_DATA</name>\r <SEPAReasonCodes>\r <SEPAReasonCode>${#Project#CHARGE_BACK_AMBIGUOUS_BANK_DATA-Code-1}</SEPAReasonCode>\r </SEPAReasonCodes>\r <fee>${#Project#CHARGE_BACK_AMBIGUOUS_BANK_DATA}</fee>\r </chargeBackParameter>\r <chargeBackParameter>\r <name>CHARGE_BACK_OBJECTION</name>\r <SEPAReasonCodes>\r <SEPAReasonCode>${#Project#CHARGE_BACK_OBJECTION-Code-1}</SEPAReasonCode>\r </SEPAReasonCodes>\r <fee>${#Project#CHARGE_BACK_OBJECTION}</fee>\r </chargeBackParameter>\r <chargeBackParameter>\r <name>CHARGE_BACK_OTHER</name>\r <fee>${#Project#CHARGE_BACK_OTHER}</fee>\r </chargeBackParameter>\r <directDebitThresholdList>\r <thresholdValue>\r <value>${#TestSuite#GENERAL_DAILY_MAX_AMOUNT}</value>\r </thresholdValue>\r </directDebitThresholdList>\r <!--type: validationCycleTypeEnum - enumeration: [DAILY_FIX_START_00,MONTHLY_FLEX_START_30_DAYS,MONTHLY_FIX_START_1]-->\r <monthlyValidationCycle>MONTHLY_FLEX_START_30_DAYS</monthlyValidationCycle>\r </directDebitParameters>\r </cus:updateDirectDebitParameters>\r </soapenv:Body>\r </soapenv:Envelope>

con:request.name: 9520N_OCS-walletThresholdEventExtNot-Trash-NotAllowed
con:request.con:request: <soapenv:Envelope xmlns:soapenv="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/envelope/" xmlns:add="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/ws/2004/08/addressing" xmlns:v1="http://www.ericsson.com/OCS/OCS_ExternalNotification_types/v1"> <soapenv:Header> <add:MessageID>http://www.your.gov/certo/dare</add:MessageID> </soapenv:Header> <soapenv:Body> <v1:walletThresholdEventExtNotRequest> <v1:userCode>${#TestSuite#DRC-OCS-extNotify-userCode}</v1:userCode> <v1:result> <!--type: string--> <v1:opReference>${#Project#GUID}</v1:opReference> <v1:subscriberRelatedInfo> <v1:subscriberId> <v1:e164Number>${#TestCase#MSISDN-Unlimit}</v1:e164Number> </v1:subscriberId> <!--type: string--> <v1:tariffPlan>3P</v1:tariffPlan> <v1:lifeCycleStatus> <!--type: string--> <v1:subscriberState>A</v1:subscriberState> <v1:subscriberSubState>A</v1:subscriberSubState> </v1:lifeCycleStatus> <!--type: string--> <v1:technologyCode>0100</v1:technologyCode> <v1:serviceProviderId>${#Project#ChargeCustomer-1-OCS-ID}</v1:serviceProviderId> </v1:subscriberRelatedInfo> <v1:monetaryInfo> <!--type: CurrencyCodeType--> <v1:currencyCode>${#Project#Currency_Default}</v1:currencyCode> <v1:opCost exponent="-2">100</v1:opCost> <v1:balance exponent="-2">500</v1:balance> </v1:monetaryInfo> <v1:operationInfo> <!--type: string--> <v1:operationCode>Test</v1:operationCode> <!--type: int--> <v1:subOperationCode>9999</v1:subOperationCode> </v1:operationInfo> <!--type: boolean--> <v1:flagOperationOrCancellation>false</v1:flagOperationOrCancellation> </v1:result> <v1:walletThresholdEvent> <v1:walletThreshold> <!--type: string--> <v1:walletId>2</v1:walletId> <v1:threshold exponent="-2">${#TestSuite#Threshold.rechargeAmount-Default}</v1:threshold> </v1:walletThreshold> </v1:walletThresholdEvent> </v1:walletThresholdEventExtNotRequest> </soapenv:Body> </soapenv:Envelope>
